name: Cyan Ball
description:
Relax with the champion ball bouncer can you get our hero to the top.

Cyan ball is the newest game from EggChell studios, a fun and additive game. Pit your wits against innovative bounce to the top free game. A colorful ball game with a cyan bouncing ball.

- Fun and Addictive gameplay
- Simple
- Relaxing to play
- Indie game
- Easy controls
- Bright effects
- Hyper Intense arcade gameplay
- Great casual experience

Coming Soon:
- Leaderboards
- Powerups
- Checkpoints

COLLAPSE
